name: Little Devil's Firework Adventure
description:
Help this little Devil to enjoy his passion - flying on firework rockets and watching the beautiful explosions and effects. Create the most amazing and shiniest firework the world has ever seen!

Make sure to collect some falling sparks on the way back to get some juicy upgrades for your fireworks. You can find them in the shop.

The goal is to find what is the key to have the best firework of them all. It might be the number of particles, or the number of flips you can make during the flight or even how close to the detonation limit you are. Who knows... but make sure to detonate the rocket in time!

Controls

Use A,D / left + right arrows to steer rocket

Press and hold B to turn off the rocket engine

Press Space to detonate the firework

Use the special key (F12 ehm ehm) to get some more money while in the shop but don't use it that much and don't tell anyone! Or I will find you!

Game engine

This game was created in Unity by Pedro and Yeenya during the Happy New Year 2022-2023 Jam.
